meanings.definition: Characterized by vulgar or indecent language or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's ribalds jokes made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her ribalds sense of humor.
meanings.sent3: The ribalds comments at the party shocked some guests.
meanings.sent4: His ribalds behavior at the formal event was inappropriate.
meanings.sent5: The movie's ribalds scenes were not suitable for children.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in vulgar or indecent language or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The ribalds in the group always made everyone blush.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled as a ribalds by her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The ribalds at the party kept everyone entertained with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the office ribalds for his crude remarks.
meanings.sent5: The ribalds in the play added a touch of humor to the performance.
